title: SKT T1 2017 Skins Revealed
body:
It's all in the YouTube channel's latest video

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=v8crNITkcX0

Faker- Syndra
Duke- Ekko
Bengi- Olaf
Wolf- Nami
Bang- Jhin

Any thoughts on the upcoming skins?

replies.body: Can someone tell me? ( although I have been playing league for quite the time) that they have been usually realising the winning team skins like this, meaning that SKT winning 2016 worlds and having the skins released this year in 2017.

> [{quoted}](name=Delty,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=2J42conI,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-06-10T08:06:06.455+0000)
>
> Can someone tell me? ( although I have been playing league for quite the time) that they have been usually realising the winning team skins like this, meaning that SKT winning 2016 worlds and having the skins released this year in 2017.

Yes. SKT won last year, the skins are made for release this year.
I'm so hyped >.< My nami gets to flop on sushi!!!!
